patterns: What are the guidelines for ragging?
responses: Ragging at IIT Campus is strictly prohibited and is a punishable offense as per the institute's honor code.

patterns: What are Supreme Court guidelines on ragging?
responses: There are strict guidelines from the Hon'ble Supreme Court to prevent ragging at the institute campuses.

patterns: Who should I inform about ragging?
responses: Please report any incident of ragging to the Hostel Management and Dean of Students immediately.

patterns: What was the anti-ragging notification in August 2021?
Tell me about August 2021 anti-ragging notification
responses: Notification regarding Anti-Ragging Committee was issued on 17.08.2021. You can view it at https://iitjammu.ac.in/notification-anti-ragging-committee-17-08-2021

patterns: What was the anti-ragging notification in October 2022?
Tell me about October 2022 anti-ragging notification
responses: Notification regarding Anti-Ragging Committee was issued on 10.10.2022. You can view it at https://iitjammu.ac.in/notification-anti-ragging-committee-10-10-2022

patterns: Tell me about standing anti-ragging committee
Show standing committee details for anti-ragging
What are the standing committees for anti-ragging?
Find information about anti-ragging standing committee
responses: Details about Standing Committees in Student Affairs section (Anti Ragging Committee) can be found at https://iitjammu.ac.in/standing-committees-student-affairs-anti-ragging

patterns: Who is in the anti-ragging squad?
responses: Details about the Anti Ragging Squad-2024 can be found at https://iitjammu.ac.in/anti-ragging-squad-2024

patterns: Tell me about anti-ragging ARC and ARS
Find information about ARC and ARS
responses: Details about Anti Ragging Committee (ARC) & Anti Ragging Squad (ARS) can be found at https://iitjammu.ac.in/anti-ragging-details-arc-ars

patterns: What does the director say about ragging?
Tell me director's views on ragging
responses: You can read the Director's message on Anti-Ragging at https://iitjammu.ac.in/directors-message-anti-ragging

patterns: How to report ragging in hostel?
Where can I complain about hostel ragging?
Whom to contact for hostel ragging?
responses: You should immediately report any ragging incidents to the Hostel Management who will take appropriate action

patterns: How to report ragging to dean?
Process to inform dean about ragging
Where can I complain to dean about ragging?
Whom to contact in dean office for ragging?
responses: You should report any incidents of ragging to the Dean of Students who will address the issue promptly

patterns: What is IIT policy on caste discrimination?
Are there rules against caste discrimination?
Tell me about caste discrimination guidelines
How does IIT handle caste discrimination?
responses: IIT Jammu strictly prohibits any discrimination based on caste or social origin by officials, faculty or staff members

patterns: Contact details of SC/ST liaison officer
How to reach SC/ST liaison officer?
responses: Dr. Rimen Jamatia is the Liaison Officer for SC/ST students at IIT Jammu

patterns: Contact details of OBC liaison officer
How to reach OBC liaison officer?
responses: Dr. Shiva S is the Liaison Officer for OBC students at IIT Jammu

patterns: Contact details of PwD liaison officer
How to reach PwD liaison officer?
responses: Dr. Aditya Shankar Sandupatla is the Liaison Officer for PwD students at IIT Jammu

patterns: Show UGC circular on caste discrimination
Where can I find UGC guidelines?
responses: The UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination can be found at https://iitjammu.ac.in/ugc-circular-prevention-caste-discrimination

patterns: What is the Equal Opportunity Cell?
Tell me about Equal Opportunity Cell
responses: The Equal Opportunity Cell oversees implementation of policies and programmes for SCs, STs, Women, OBC, EWS, and PwDs, providing guidance and counselling in various matters.
The institute ensures equal opportunities for all communities on campus and promotes social inclusion through the Equal Opportunity Cell.
The Dean (FA) serves as the Chairperson of the Equal Opportunity Cell (Ex-Officio).
EOC members include AD Student Affairs, Liaison Officers for SC/ST/OBC/PwD, and AR (E II) as Member Convenor, all serving ex-officio.

patterns: What are the responsibilities of the ICC?
Tell me about the ICC's responsibilities
What is the role of the ICC?
responses: The ICC is responsible for receiving complaints of sexual harassment and conducting inquiries into them. It acts as an internal mechanism for redressal and plays a vital role in sensitizing employees about their rights and educating them about the prevention of sexual harassment. The ICC's duties extend beyond addressing complaints; it also plays a proactive role in promoting awareness, preventing sexual harassment, and creating a work culture that is respectful and free from harassment.

Prof. Renu Nanda is the Presiding Officer of the ICC. She is the Head of the Department (Education) at the University of Jammu, located at Baba Saheb Ambedkar Road, Jammu Tawi (J&K). You can reach her via email at listenrenu@yahoo.com.
Dr. Riya Bhowmik is a Member of the ICC and is affiliated with the PIC, ICC at IIT Jammu. You can contact her at riya.bhowmik@iitjammu.ac.in.
The Registrar serves as the Convener of the ICC. You can reach the Registrar at registrar@iitjammu.ac.in.

Ms. Natasha Chaudhary is a Member of the ICC and is affiliated with Kalamkari Centre Society, located opposite Janipur Police Station, Paloura Jammu - 180007. You can contact her at 0191-2592952 or via email at kcswomenjammu@gmail.com.
Ms. Asmi Srivastava is a Member of the ICC. You can contact her via email at 2022UCS0084@iitjammu.ac.in.
Mr. Abhishek Verma is a Member of the ICC. You can contact him via email at 2021UME0198@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: What is the role of the IEC?
responses: The Institute Ethics Committee (IEC) of IIT-Jammu is an independent committee under the Dean, Research and Consultancy. The IEC, IIT-Jammu, is responsible for the scrutiny and approval of all research projects involving human subjects. It ensures that ethical principles are followed in the collection of experimental data, the analysis of such data, and the maintenance of security and confidentiality of subject data. The IEC ensures that the rights of human research subjects are always protected.

patterns: What is the constitution of the IEC?
Tell me about the constitution of the IEC
What guidelines does the IEC follow?
Who are the experts in IEC?
responses: The constitution of the IEC, IIT-Jammu follows the guidelines given by the Indian Council for Medical Research (ICMR). The IEC, IIT-Jammu contains several external experts as well as faculty members from IIT-Jammu.

patterns: Where can I find the IEC SOPs and Proposal Templates?
Tell me about the IEC SOP and application templates
Where are the IEC templates available?
responses: The Standard Operating Procedures and Proposal Application Templates for the IEC, IIT-Jammu are currently under preparation. They can be downloaded from here: IEC_SOP_Draft_July2021, IEC_InterventionalStudyTemplate, IEC_ObservationalStudyTemplate, EthicsCommittee_ReferenceDocuments. Completed applications must be emailed to: IEC [at] iitjammu [dot] ac [dot] in.

patterns: Tell me about SC/ST Cell functions
responses: The SC/ST Students Cell addresses academic and non-academic issues for reserved category students, ensuring an inclusive environment free from discrimination.

patterns: How do you handle caste discrimination?
responses: Officials, faculty and staff must avoid discrimination against SC/ST students based on social origin and maintain sensitivity in handling such incidents.
Dr. Rimen Jamatia is the Liaison Officer for SC/ST at IIT Jammu.

patterns: Where is UGC circular on discrimination?
responses: The UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination is available in English and Hindi on the IIT Jammu website.
SC/ST complaints can be filed through the online complaint form available on the Google Forms platform.

patterns: Tell me about IIT Jammu location
responses: IIT Jammu is located at Jagti, NH-44, PO Nagrota Jammu-181221 J&K, India.
Prof. Manoj Singh Gaur is the Director of IIT Jammu since June 2017, contactable at director@iitjammu.ac.in or 0191-257-0380.

patterns: What is the vision of IIT Jammu?
What is the mission of IIT Jammu?
responses: The vision of IIT Jammu is to create tomorrow's world through technological interventions that are humanistic, creative, and futuristic. The mission is to Learn, Engage, Invent, and Create Impact.

patterns: What are the functions and duties of IIT Jammu?
Tell me the functions of IIT Jammu
What are the responsibilities of IIT Jammu?
responses: IIT Jammu operates under the Institutes of Technology Act 1961, The Institutes of Technology (Amendment) Act, 2016, and The First Statutes of IIT Jammu, 2017. The complete document can be found [here](https://iitjammu.ac.in/homepage/IIT%20ACT/First%20Statutes-913-977%20-%20IIT%20JAMMU.pdf).

patterns: What are the administrative committees of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the committees in IIT Jammu
responses: IIT Jammu has several administrative committees such as the Board of Governors, Finance Committee, Building and Works, and Senate. You can find more details on the [IIT Jammu website](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/).

patterns: What is the total budget of IIT Jammu?
How much is the budget of IIT Jammu?
Tell me the budget details of IIT Jammu
responses: The total budget of IIT Jammu is Rs. 458.30 crores. The breakdown includes: OH-31: Rs. 28.50 Cr, OH-35: Rs. 395.14 Cr, OH-36: Rs. 34.66 Cr.

patterns: What is the budget for tours at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about foreign and domestic tours at IIT Jammu
responses: No separate budget is allotted for tours. Tours include places like Bangalore, Bhubaneshwar, Hyderabad, etc. The expenditure follows the institute's rules.

patterns: Who are the RTI officers at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about RTI officers at IIT Jammu
responses: The RTI officers at IIT Jammu are Dr. Shivnath Mazumder (CPIO) and Dr. Durai Prabhakaran R T (FAA). Contact CPIO at cpio@iitjammu.ac.in and FAA at faa@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: How can I get information from IIT Jammu?
Tell me about information dissemination at IIT Jammu
responses: Information from IIT Jammu is disseminated through their [website](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/rti) and email at cpio@iitjammu.ac.in. Details are available upon request.

patterns: What kind of training programs are offered at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about training programs at IIT Jammu
responses: IIT Jammu offers short-term training programs and expert sessions. Employees are encouraged to participate in these training programs.

patterns: What is the third-party audit date of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the third-party audit at IIT Jammu
responses: The third-party audit for IIT Jammu is scheduled for 28 June 2024. The audit report will be available on the website.
